channel.title: Game keeps quitting
channel.description:
Okay so I have got it to launch successfully through WineSkin... however, whenever I press any key on my keyboard when playing BM it just quits... almost as if I told it to quit so there aren't any errors or anything like that.
Please could someone help me out?
I am using a MacBook Pro with Retina Display (Early 2013) with OS X Yosemite Beta.

item.title: Game keeps quitting
item.dc:creator: triforceguy1
item.description:
Okay, I found a solution, it seems all I needed to do was to disable the in-game overlays

Read full topic
